snippet: A spacious two-bedroom co-op the Italian tenor Luciano Pavarotti once used as a pied-à-terre is poised to enter the market.
abstract: Spacious two-bedroom co-op that Italian tenor Luciano Pavarotti once used as a pied-a-terre is poised to enter the market at $13.7 million; 23rd-floor apartment at 150 Central Park South has vistas of the entirety of Central Park.
lead_paragraph: A spacious two-bedroom co-op the Italian tenor Luciano Pavarotti once used as a pied-à-terre is poised to enter the market.

headline.print_headline: A View Worthy of an Aria
headline.seo: Pavarotti’s Central Park South Co-op for Sale
headline.main: A View Worthy of an Aria
